snippet: McGOWAN--Joseph J.,Jr. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their distinguished colleague and longtime friend, Joseph McGowan, and send condolences to his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: McGOWAN--Joseph J.,Jr. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their distinguished colleague and longtime friend, Joseph McGowan, and send condolences to his family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCGOWAN, JOSEPH J.
